column1: #Text=He was made famous after being taken into custody by police when a teacher thought a clock he brought to his Texas school looked like a bomb .
#Text=Mohamed joins the ranks of influential teens including US President Barack Obama ' s daughter Malia Obama , and Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai .
#Text=Image : Courtesy of the Office of Congressman Mike Honda .
#Text=said of Mohamed in announcing the news : " Not many people make national news by bringing a homemade clock to school .
